title: Super May and the Red Cape
backCoverBlurb: May is a real superhero! With his bright red cape and big blue eyes, he's ready to fly and help everyone in his neighborhood in this exciting adventure.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He often looks surprised or excited with his mouth in an 'O' shape. He is wearing a bright red cape over a blue and white striped shirt.

pages.text: May put on his bright red cape. Snap! it went around his neck. Now I am a hero! Can you stand tall?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is wearing a bright red cape and standing very straight and tall on a green lawn, looking brave.

pages.text: He zoomed across the garden. Whoosh! The wind felt cool on his face. He felt so fast.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is running fast with his red cape fluttering behind him like a flag in the sunny garden.

pages.text: Super May heard a tiny cry. Meow! A little kitty was stuck high up in a tree.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking up at a tall tree with his mouth in an 'O' shape, looking surprised and focused.

pages.text: I will help you, kitty! May reached up with his strong arms. Stretch, stretch!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is reaching high towards a branch, showing his back as his red cape spreads out.

pages.text: The kitty jumped into May's soft arms. Purr! Super May saved the day.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is holding a small grey kitten and smiling happily, looking very empowered.

pages.text: Then he saw Grandpa. His heavy bags made a loud thud! on the ground.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking at a man standing with two big brown grocery bags by a garden gate.

pages.text: Super May used his super strength to help carry a bag. He felt so strong and useful.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is trying to lift a bag with a determined and focused expression on his face.

pages.text: Thank you, May! said Grandpa with a big smile and a warm hug. You are my hero.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. Grandpa is patting May's head, and May is smiling widely with pride.

pages.text: Being a hero is about helping and being kind. Super May felt very, very happy.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing with his hands on his hips, looking content and powerful in the garden.

pages.text: It was time for a superhero snack. Crunch! May ate a yummy red apple. Can you pretend to eat an apple?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting at a wooden table, taking a big bite out of a red apple, looking delighted.

pages.text: Even heroes get sleepy. May took off his cape and folded it carefully. Shhh...
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is holding his folded red cape and walking towards his bed with a tired expression.

pages.text: Goodnight, Super May. You did a great job today. Sleep tight with a happy heart.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sleeping soundly, looking very calm and safe under a warm blanket.
